#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long long int rev(long long int);
long long int rev(long long int a){
  long long int b,r,s=0;
  while(a>0){  
         s = s * 10;
      s = s + a%10;
      a= a/10;
  }
  return s;
}
int main()
{
    long long int t,a,b;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        cin>>a;
        cin>>b;
        a=rev(a);
        b=rev(b);
        a=a+b;
        a=rev(a);
        cout<<a<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
